text: Harvie Dwight Pocza (born September 22, 1959) is a Canadian retired ice hockey player who briefly played in the National Hockey League with the Washington Capitals. Pocza was drafted 67th overall by the Capitals in the 1979 NHL Entry Draft. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Billings Bighorns players Category:Calgary Centennials players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Living people Category:People from Lethbridge Category:Washington Capitals players
title: Harvie Pocza
